page.text: Being a modern Python library, PyTgCalls requires Python 3.6+ to be installed in your system. We recommend using the latest versions of both Python 3 and pip.

list.item: Get Python 3 from https://www.python.org/downloads/ (or with your package manager).
Get pip by following the instructions at https://pip.pypa.io/en/latest/installing/.

page.alert: PyTgCalls supports Python 3 only, starting from version 3.7. PyPy is supported too.
